title: iraNDum kUDin inbam
sahitya:
iraNDum kUDin inbam inrEl enrum tunbamE 
ihamum paramum aghamum puramum


anupallavi

  varaNDa turavumillai manam iruNDa paTrumillai vAzhvu 
vasanta shOlai pOlE vaLara anbum arivum kiLara


caraNam    Anum peNNum pOlE maNIppUNum ponnum pOLE
aNU vijnAnamuDanE shuddAtma jnAna oLiyum vENDum
